file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-23-05-06 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT DISCHARGE PIPING - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT DISCHARGE PIPING - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the discharge piping of the baggage- compartment fire-extinguishing system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY DISCHARGE PIPING OF THE BAGGAGE- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-05-200-801-A COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHING COMPARTMENT SYSTEM - VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-23-05 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-05-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. DISCHARGE PIPING OF THE BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM - VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to do the discharge piping visual inspection. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-05/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment 273 273ATC/273BTC/273CTC Baggage compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic/baggage compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put the ladder in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 26-23-05 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the electronic compartment. (4) Remove baggage lining panels 273ATC/273BTC/273CTC ( AMM MPP 06-41-05/100) and ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400). J. Discharge Piping of the Baggage-Compartment Fire-Extinguishing System (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the discharge piping/nozzle of the baggage-compartment fire-extinguishing system for cracks, nicks, dents, bend and loose fittings. If necessary, replace or repair. NOTE: Small dents in the discharge nozzles are acceptable if they do not cause obstruction or nozzle-hole diameter change that can decrease discharging operation. Repair is not necessary. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install baggage lining panels 273ATC/273BTC/273CTC ( AMM MPP 06-41-05/100) and ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) Remove the ladder from the work area. (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the BAGGAGE FIRE EXTG circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it.
